name: Robot Scramble
description:
You are a robot, designed to help take care of an antimater power plant, You were supposed to take care of the facility alone only for a few days, while the rest of the crew took shelter, it has been years, unfortunatelly you have no safe means to disable the facilty, recently the machines have become more unstable, you are not sure how long you will last.

This is my entry for the godot wild jam, I'm not getting my hopes up about winning but is nice to actually finish a game.

Warning: this game features the sound of sirens blarring proeminently, and is designed to be stressfull, player discretion is advised.
